SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: SF122-In General You Say Your Health Is
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 12 Health Survey Acute, US Version 1.0 - In general, would you say your health is.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF12 v1.0 Acute - In General You Say Your Health Is

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 12 Health Survey Acute, US Version 1.0 - How much does your health now limit you in - moderate activities, such as moving a table, pushing a vacuum cleaner, bowling, or playing golf.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF12 v1.0 Acute - Limit Moderate Activities

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 12 Health Survey Acute, US Version 1.0 - How much does your health now limit you in - climbing several flights of stairs.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF12 v1.0 Acute - Limit Climbing Several Flights

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 12 Health Survey Acute, US Version 1.0 - During the past week, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of your physical health - accomplished less than you would like.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF12 v1.0 Acute - Physical: Accomplished Less

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 12 Health Survey Acute, US Version 1.0 - During the past week, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of your physical health - were limited in the kind of work or other activities.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF12 v1.0 Acute - Physical: Limited Kind of Work

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 12 Health Survey Acute, US Version 1.0 - During the past week, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of any emotional problems (such as feeling depressed or anxious) - accomplished less than you would like.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF12 v1.0 Acute - Emotional: Accomplished Less

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 12 Health Survey Acute, US Version 1.0 - During the past week, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of any emotional problems (such as feeling depressed or anxious) - did work or other activities less carefully than usual.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF12 v1.0 Acute - Emotional: Did Work Less Carefully

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 12 Health Survey Acute, US Version 1.0 - During the past week, how much did pain interfere with your normal work (including both work outside the home and housework)?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF12 v1.0 Acute - Pain Interfere With Normal Work

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: SF122-Have You Felt Calm and Peaceful
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 12 Health Survey Acute, US Version 1.0 - Please give the one answer that comes closest to the way you have been feeling. How much of the time during the past week - have you felt calm and peaceful?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF12 v1.0 Acute - Have You Felt Calm and Peaceful

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: SF122-Did You Have a Lot of Energy
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 12 Health Survey Acute, US Version 1.0 - Please give the one answer that comes closest to the way you have been feeling. How much of the time during the past week - did you have a lot of energy?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF12 v1.0 Acute - Did You Have a Lot of Energy

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 12 Health Survey Acute, US Version 1.0 - Please give the one answer that comes closest to the way you have been feeling. How much of the time during the past week - have you felt downhearted and blue?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF12 v1.0 Acute - You Felt Downhearted and Blue

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 12 Health Survey Acute, US Version 1.0 - During the past week, how much of the time has your physical health or emotional problems interfered with your social activities (like visiting friends, relatives, etc.)?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF12 v1.0 Acute - Time Physical Health, Emotional Interfered

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 12 Health Survey Acute, US Version 1.0 - Physical component score.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF12 v1.0 Acute - Physical Component Score

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 12 Health Survey Acute, US Version 1.0 - Mental component score.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF12 v1.0 Acute - Mental Component Score

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 12 Health Survey Acute, US Version 1.0 - SF-6D_R2 (utility index release 2) score.
